about_the_game:
Death Duel VR Demo
Death Duel VR is an online melee fighting game that is trying to deliver historical accurate medieval duel combat online between real players, the combat is fully supported with realistic physics.

Any one who is enthusiastic to fight in PvP online with realistic swords collision and physics interaction should try this Physics-Driven VR PvP Medieval Duel game. 

The PvP combat is also featured with grappling, and not just limited to fight on the foots but also fight on horse back(Jousting).  

Death Duel VR is designed to be HEMA friendly, many real-life Guards and martial art techniques can be easily pulled off in PvP match.  

Major Features include:
  • Real Physics Based Weapon Collision For Multiplayer (No Cool-Down Mechanic)
  • Jousting Combat
  • Full-body physics for game character
  • Sectional Damages - each limb can be crippled with physical effect
  • Vast variety of medieval weapons to choose from
  • Different sized weapons have different feeling of weight

What included in this Demo

  • Mutilplayer Mode
  • Challenge Mode (Signleplayer)
  • Warrior Level up to Tier 3
  • One character

name: Death Duel VR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Death Duel VR is a Physic-Driven Online PVP game that is trying to deliver historical accurate medieval duel combat. The game is HEMA friendly. Practitioners of martial arts can test their skills against real players in PvP duel with weapon and grappling which are fully supported by physics.
